Elrinir 工作室此图的开发工作室镇楼~~团队合影

[feather]原文留言
We've finally finished one of our earlier projects, the Paladin Palace. Why was it re-uploaded? Because of drastic changes to both interior and exterior (if we would have to update the original, we would have to delete all original content and re-upload new screenshots, which is a lot easier by just re-uploading the project). 
Big thanks to: 
- Elperath, for the cinematic 
- The BeastsMC Community, for great support! 

You can also check out this build on the BeastsMC server! 

A showcase by SilboMovies!
